titleStmt.title: Cathedrall newes from Canterbury shewing, the Canterburian Cathedrall to bee in an abbey-like, corrupt, and rotten condition, which cals for a speedy reformation, or dissolution : vvhich dissolution is already foreshowne, and begun there, by many remarkeable passages upon that place, and the prelats there : amongst which passages of wonder is, the Archbishop of Canterburies passing-bell, rung miraculously in that cathedrall / recorded and published by Richard Culmer ...
titleStmt.author: Culmer, Richard, d. 1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Rich. Cotes for Fulk Clifton,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
